reviews.name: lc450_88
reviews.title: Keep Your Little One Comfortable and Dry with Huggies Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2024
reviews.review:
Ensure your baby stays dry, comfortable, and happy throughout the day with Huggies Size 2 Diapers - Little Snugglers Baby Diapers. This comprehensive review outlines why these diapers are a parent's top choice for keeping their little one snug and dry:

Superior Absorbency and Leak Protection:
Huggies Little Snugglers Size 2 Diapers are crafted with advanced features to provide superior absorbency and leak protection. The absorbent core locks away moisture quickly, while the Leak Lock System forms a protective barrier around your baby's legs to prevent leaks and keep their skin dry and irritation-free.

Gentle on Delicate Skin:
Designed with your baby's delicate skin in mind, Huggies Little Snugglers Diapers feature a GentleAbsorb Liner that is hypoallergenic and free of harsh chemicals like chlorine, fragrance, and lotion. This soft, breathable liner helps keep your baby's skin healthy and comfortable, reducing the risk of irritation and diaper rash.

Comfortable Fit and Flexibility:
With their flexible waistband and stretchy sides, Huggies Little Snugglers Size 2 Diapers provide a comfortable and secure fit for babies weighing 12-18 lbs. The gentle elastic waistband moves with your baby's movements, ensuring a snug yet flexible fit that allows for comfortable play and exploration.

Wetness Indicator:
Say goodbye to guesswork with the wetness indicator feature found in Huggies Little Snugglers Diapers. This handy feature changes color when the diaper is wet, providing a visual cue for parents to know when it's time for a diaper change, helping to keep your baby clean, dry, and comfortable at all times.

Convenient Packaging and Value:
Huggies Size 2 Diapers come in a convenient packaging format of 180 diapers, divided into 3 packs of 60 diapers each. This bulk packaging offers excellent value for money, ensuring you always have a sufficient supply of diapers on hand to meet your baby's needs.

Trusted Brand with a Legacy of Quality:
Huggies is a trusted brand with a legacy of providing high-quality diapers and baby care products for generations. With their commitment to innovation, comfort, and reliability, Huggies Little Snugglers Diapers have earned the trust and loyalty of parents worldwide.

Conclusion:
In conclusion, Huggies Size 2 Diapers - Little Snugglers Baby Diapers are the perfect choice for parents seeking superior absorbency, leak protection, and comfort for their little ones. With their gentle design, comfortable fit, wetness indicator, convenient packaging, and trusted brand reputation, these diapers offer everything you need to keep your baby dry, happy, and healthy. Invest in Huggies Little Snugglers Size 2 Diapers and enjoy peace of mind knowing your baby is getting the best in diaper protection and care.

reviews.name: Ash Appleby
reviews.title: COMPARED 6 DIAPERS
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2018
reviews.review:
REVIEW OF SIX DIAPER COMPARISONS OVER COURSE OF 7 MONTHS.
I hope this helps all the momma’s out there make an educated decision on their babies well-being :)

Prices on all of these diapers (size 3s are what’s shown in pictures) tends to fluctuate but in general the most expensive to least expensive is as follows: Huggies Snugglers, Amazon Mama Bear, Pampers Swaddlers, Huggies Little Movers, Natural Eden & Earth, Huggies Snug and Dry.

*All have wet strip indicators.
*Rated all these out of 6 without duplicating a rating.
*All diapers were tested for at least 3 weeks at a time and I did size up if they got a bit too snug so fit was ideal for a comparison.
*Reviewed in picture order sequence

Comparison was given on the following categories: overall outside material, inside material, back pocket/elastic back, added fragrance, design, straps durability, #2s, overnights, and lastly additional issues (if applicable)

~~HUGGIES LITTLE SNUGGLERS~~
-Thickest of all the diapers I tested
-Inside material is soft to the touch and durable feeling
-Extra strong elastic back layer “pocket” to catch #2s so they don’t ride up back
-Has additional side purple internal straps for extra durability for movement (note: these are not on the N-2 size diapers, only starting at size 3)
-Didn’t have any fragrance added to diaper which I liked, less chemicals
-Cute design, classic clean look, Winnie the Pooh
-Straps are soft material and attach to diaper nicely throughout entire length of strap
-Contains #2 waste awesome
-Hold great overnight 8-10 hours (multiple #1s, haven’t had #2 to test yet)
***Personal rating out of 6 would be 6/6***

~~AMAZON MAMA BEAR “Premium”~~
-Near identical to Snugglers with a few variations
-Thick material overall
-Inside material is soft to the touch (softer than Snugglers) and durable feeling
-Medium strength back elastic (doesn’t have the “pocket” design) to catch #2s so they don’t ride up
-Didn’t have any fragrance added to diaper which I liked, less chemicals
-Cute design, soft blue bear design (they have plain white option too but I haven’t tested those)
-Straps are soft material and attach to diaper nicely throughout entire length of strap
-Contains #2 waste great
-Holds well overnight 8-10 hours (multiple #1s, haven’t had #2 to test yet)
-Occasionally leaves tiny gel balls, doesn’t seem to affect my daughter though in terms of any irritation
***Personal rating out of 6 would be 5/6***

~~EDEN & EARTH “Natural” Diapers~~
-Medium thick overall material
-Inside material is soft (super soft, think Viva paper towels soft) to the touch but not as durable feeling like first two. Most “natural” materials. Great diaper if your baby has diaper rash and closest to cloth diaper amongst most disposables
-Doesn’t have back pocket or but does have medium strength elastic and seems to contain #2s as long as there isn’t a lot or they aren’t too runny
-Didn’t have any fragrance added to diaper which I liked, less chemicals
-Plain simple design
-Straps are soft material and attach to diaper nicely throughout entire length of strap
-Has additional side internal straps for extra durability for movement
-Doesn’t contain #2 the best if I forget to check for, say, an hour. You can see the brown color start to show through the diaper material, no official leaks though
-Doesn’t hold multiple #1s as well overnight (no leaks though) just feels “damp” - it’s possible it’s just the gel absorbent that just feels cool to the touch
***Personal rating out of 6 would be 3/6***

~~HUGGIES LITTLE MOVERS~~
-Overall medium thick material
-Inside material is soft to touch (near identical as Snugglers) and more on the durable feeling side like the Snugglers/Mama Bear
-Strong back elastic (doesn’t have the “pocket” design) to catch #2s so they don’t ride up
-Didn’t have any fragrance added to diaper which I liked, less chemicals
-Mickey and Minnie Mouse design
-Straps are soft material and attach to diaper nicely throughout entire length of strap
-Has additional side purple internal straps for extra durability for movement (diaper is made for size 3 and up, not a smaller size in this version)
-Contains #2 waste great like Snugglers/Mama Bear
-Holds well overnight 8-10 hours (multiple #1s, haven’t had #2 to test yet)
***Personal rating out of 6 would be 4/6***

~~HUGGIES SNUG AND DRY~~
-Surprisingly on the thinner side overall (even though name has “dry” in it, I just imagined them being much thicker)
-Inside material is soft (similar to Edens natural which was nice) to the touch yet feels durable enough
-Medium strength back elastic (doesn’t have the “pocket” design) to catch #2s so they don’t ride up
-Straps are soft material and attach to diaper nicely throughout entire length of strap
-Didn’t have any fragrance added to diaper which I liked, less chemicals
-Mickey mouse design. Probably useless observation but it has a loud crunchy sound when working with the diaper
-Seemingly holds #1s and #2s ok but not as great as the rest. Still gets the job done just fine though.
-Doesn’t hold as well overnight, but no leaks officially. Feels “damp” after #1 sits for maybe longer than an hour. It’s possible it’s just the gel absorbent that just feels cool to the touch.
-Ran the smallest in terms of overall fit, maybe that’s why it’s called “snug” and dry?
***Personal rating out of 6 would be 2/6***

~~PAMPERS SWADDLERS~~
-Size N through 2 seems to be a thinner material than size 3 through 4 from my testings. The thin versions are similar to Huggies snug and dry and the thicker versions are similar to Mama Bear
-Inside material is very soft but was more of a mesh type of material verse thicker cloth type. After diaper changes it looked like the layers separated easily but still contained the waste just fine from what I could tell.
-No back elastic or pocket at all to contain #2s. I have had to clean upper back messes with these diapers, I’d say at least one #2 a day for two weeks straight of upper back clean ups with my daughter
-Had a baby powder smell to them, which indicates an added fragrance
-Elmo design
-Straps are a harder plastic type of material that I would think is uncomfortable if it grazed my daughters tummy. Also, the portion of the strap that sticks to the diaper is probably only 1/3rd of the actual strap so I had “loose” straps that easily came undone when getting my daughter dressed if her clothes snagged onto the non-sticky part of the straps.
-Doesn’t contain #2s very well in my opinion, multiple leaks mainly in my daughters upper back
-Holds up decent overnight 6-8 hours due to overall diaper thickness for multiple #1s (haven’t had to test #2s yet)
-Occasionally leaves tiny gel balls, doesn’t seem to affect my daughter though in terms of any irritation
-Ran the largest in terms of overall fit
***Personal rating out of 6 would be 1/6***

reviews.name: Real_Customer
reviews.title: Great product
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2024
reviews.review: If you are looking for the best diapers for your baby, then buy Huggies Little Snugglers. I have 4 children and 3 of them used these diapers and I still use them for my little princess. There is no irritation after using them, even if the baby wears a long time. Also, good absorption and do not leak. We have tried many different brands that are sold in our stores, from which we always had problems. Irritation on the baby's skin, leakage, etc. But after trying these diapers, we do not want to buy others. We forgot about sleepless nights, the baby crying from irritation on skin, etc. They are the best for the baby. Also, we tried Huggies little movers, but they often leaked and hung like a bag even if they were just a little full, which never happened with Huggies Little Snugglers. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: C. Mehta
reviews.title: Better than pampers & great for nightime
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024
reviews.review: I always thought that pampers was the #1 nappy/diaper brand and that is what we were given in the hospital. As a new mum I wanted to make sure we started out with the best (now we do Costco nappies :)) and so I kept ordering pampers. When we sleep trained our baby I needed something that would potentially see her through 12 hours without a change. She is very small - we sleep trained at 4 months and she was (and still is) wearing a size 2 nappy. This meant that she was too small for night time nappies. I bought a small pack of the huggies to try and they fit well AND last through the night! They are hands down the best nappies I have used (the costco ones are also very good. We use them during the day). We will keep using huggies as our nightime nappy and I highly recommend them to all! If you are in a similar position to us of needing nigh time nappies for a little baby who is too small for overnights, these nappies will do the trick! Do not hesitate!

Only downside is there is a slight weird chemical smell when the diaper gets wet. It doesn't irritate my daughter and doesn't really bother me but it the smell did take some time to get used to.

reviews.name: Tatiana Racheva
reviews.title: Uneven quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.review:
I prefer these because they're unscented, but I have a couple of issues with them.

First of all, the latest batch that I got has a lot of loose polymer granules. I see them on my baby's skin when I change the diaper, and I see the dry granules that look like very fine sand on the surface where I'm changing her. That shouldn't happen, and it wasn't happening with the previous batch of the same size diapers.

Second, supposedly these diapers are great for leak protection. I don't find this to be the case, especially when it comes to poop. Almost every time my baby poops, I have to do a wardrobe change.

Again, at least they're unscented. But, given the above two issues, I'm going to try Pampers again...

reviews.name: AmazonCusty
reviews.title: 2nd favorite Huggies diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.review:
These are my second favorite Huggies diaper…followed by the special delivery.
These diapers are cute, fit well & I love how soft they are. However, the cotton rips off easily sometimes getting stuck to the purple side tabs and sometimes I notice it on my son. I don’t use these for overnight use, so I’m not sure how they hold up overnight, but during the day they’re pretty good diapers. I will buy again.

reviews.name: RachaelXO
reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2016
reviews.review: Yessss!!😊 Huggies are the first box of diapers I stocked up on as I was pregnant. I chose to start stocking up on them because I researched "Mom's favorite diapers" and it came up as number one. Also, it was the brand my Mom used for my brother and I. My husband and I purchased a couple large boxes ( we knew we'd get more at our shower), because we needed enough for our baby girl to be changed 10-12 times a day, which is the norm. When I had her I ended up favoring as for the newborn diapers the Pampers. That's what the hospital provided us and my cousin even got us a big box and I'm grateful she did. The way the newborn pampers fit and held pee, I felt were better for our baby girl. However, now that she 3 months and a size 2, all I like now are Huggies! I used mainly all Huggies size 1 and size 2 now for her of the Huggies, and they're way better fitting and hold pee way better than Pampers or any other brand is what I feel. I'll use Huggies from here on out for her. When we have our second child, I'll do the same routine that worked for us, newborn Pampers then Huggies size 1 up!

reviews.name: licialowoke
reviews.title: Great diapers, but differences between sizes.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2016
reviews.review: So far Little Snugglers are the only diapers our son can wear. Pampers cut into him, Luvs leak (as well as every other diaper on the shelf), and the Snug N Dry from Huggies feel wet on the outside of the diaper after our son pees. Ick! These are the only diapers that will actually contain his messes and not leak from the legs or soak through on the front. They really will go 12 hours too, and our son is a HEAVY wetter! The newborn - size 2s were wonderful, but once we got to size 3 we noticed that the diaper has more of a papery feel to it, like the Snug N Dry. It concerns us because we don't want to deal with soak throughs again, and so far we haven't, but we're afraid it's coming. As a note, we change him almost every 2-3 hours.The size 3s also come with a longer strip to fit around pudgy legs which is wonderful since our son is chunky. The Pooh characters are a nice touch and make the diaper look nicer compared to the Snug N Dry, but that's simply my opinion. I love these diapers and recommend the smaller sizes to new parents, but I think our love affair may be cut short :(

reviews.name: lindsay
reviews.title: Some overnight leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.review: We never had an issue with overnight pee leaks in Little Movers but we have had leaks with these.

reviews.title: Great for brand change
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.review: I just switched from Pampers because of leaking. I have had a great experience so far! They a lot are bigger on the waist band than pampers

reviews.name: Nikki Dee
reviews.title: Best brand in my opinion
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.review: My baby likes these the best, and they seem to keep moisture off the skin so haven't had issues with rashes. They also absorb great and I never have problems with leaks. Great quality. I'd choose huggies over any other brand.

reviews.name: cookies
reviews.title: Be careful about package labelling in the photo
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.review: I ordered these as a baby shower gift. (Note, the recipient's registry was with Target, who wouldn't do delivery... I live in a different state). Their baby is yet to be born, but hopefully they will arrive at the due date at a healthy weight. These looked identical to the product my friends requested, but I missed the "P" in the picture. Unfortunately, the product description was generic without reference to sizing, so I only noticed this detail when I went to track the delivery. Just thought I'd share in case the less detail oriented folks out there do as I did, and accidentally order the wrong size.

reviews.name: Sam
reviews.title: Perfect for healthier babies
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.review: In comparison to other brands Huggies under same size is more stretchable and last longer. My baby is on the healthier side this fits her better then any other brand of the same size.

reviews.name: Jazmyne Morris
reviews.title: Hasn’t let me down yet
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.review: Been using them for two months now, they seem pretty good. I’ve had poop come out the sides a few times, but it was minor. I change my infant every two-three hours, I missed a change in the middle of the night after a feeding, when I woke up for the next feeding that thing was FULL. did not leak though.

reviews.name: Dreamer
reviews.title: My favorite for my daughter
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.review:
They used this brand in the NICU with daughter & I continued to use it months later. I've tried other brands and found 1 that I liked as much but that's about it.

I love that it doesn't leave marks in her skin that'll make you believe the diaper was tight or small when it wasn't. (That's my problem with many other brands)

I will continue to use until she's potty trained

reviews.name: Jean
reviews.title: Good quality materials
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.review: What's not to like in a good Huggy

reviews.name: Anne M
reviews.title: Still a great diaper, but different from what you'll find in your local store
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2017
reviews.review: We've always been loyal Huggies customers, they don't have added fragrance like Pampers and they seem to fit better (love the blowout pocket at the top of the back). I did read reviews from current buyers when I setup this subscription complaining that these are different from the ones found at Costco. I just received our first box from Amazon and still have some left from Costco, and found that they are different. These are not as thick and are narrower between the legs. That being said, we haven't had any problems with them, in some ways I like them better because they fit a bit better but I don't know how they'd hold up through the night. I've been using the bigger ones at night because they seem like they will last longer. I knocked off a star because I don't like the business practice Huggies has gone with by offering an inferior product but marketing it as the same that's found at brick & mortar stores.

reviews.name: Faimee
reviews.title: To small for a newborn
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.review: The diapers are really soft , but the newborn size is very small look more for premie I’m gonna have to size up on my next oder waiting to see if my daughter will fit the newborn I won’t buy anymore N on size

reviews.name: Md Enayet Hossain
reviews.title: Quality needs to be reevaluated
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.review: I have been using huggies since my baby was born. This diaper is good for sensitive baby skin. Absorbency and leak protection is also good. However, a cheap copy of Huggies is shipped sometimes. In my last order, 20% of the diapers had one strap missing, making those diapers useless. I do recommend this diaper but Amazon needs to ensure quality or we should buy from another place.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Need to change size

reviews.review: Like

reviews.title: Good
