reviews.review: Good

reviews.name: Lee Family's
reviews.title: Nice
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.review: Good value. Hard to find size. Recommend

reviews.name: Ashley Clark
reviews.title: A new Huggies fan
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.review:
The ones from Amazon are more stiff/less comfortable than the ones from the hospital and bought at walmart. 5/5 for little snugglers, 4/5 for the ones purchased on Amazon.

The hospital sent me home with these diapers. At first I thought it was a downgrade from Pampers (as with my first that's what I used), but the more I used these, the more I preferred them over Pampers. Huggies are better for chunkier babies, especially around the thighs. These are now my go to diapers. I will continue to buy these and only these from now on. They're super absorbent and I prefer them over any other brand I've tried.

reviews.name: Tsatsaanaa
reviews.title: Fits bit smaller than panpers but material is good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.review: I used Pampers swaddlers for my daughter until size 4. But then it started leaving white pints on so i decided to try Huggies. I think it fits bit smaller than Pampers but material is good. Stays dry when when its full.

reviews.name: Andrea T
reviews.title: Overall Pretty Good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.review: No one really expects a preemie so we had to hurry and grab these. Overall they are really good, they fit our 4lb babe and stay on. Easy to read blue line for the quick night time check. The only annoyance is that the tabs are a bit hard to pull but not the worst.

reviews.name: Tom Willis
reviews.title: They work great 👍
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.review: Like everything about these. They can hold it away from your baby so they stay comfortable at night so I can get some rest 😴

reviews.name: Abigail Hansen
reviews.title: Lots of leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.review:
We get lots of leaks with these but they work better than other brand we’ve tried. They’re very absorbant though and don’t irritate babies skin

Update: I wouldn't use any other brand for toddler poops. Those things are nasty and these diapers keep everything nice and contained.

reviews.name: Erika Allen
reviews.title: Good for bigger newborns
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.review: Our daughter was only 6lbs 3 oz when we came home and these were too big. Blowouts and leaks! However, when she gained a little weight these were fantastic!

reviews.name: QoE
reviews.title: Product is inconsistent
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
reviews.review: I would give 5 stars because I prefer Huggies over any other diaper we have tried but I have ordered the same product from Amazon multiple times (Huggies Little Snugglers Size 2) and I get 2 different products - one with purple tabs and one without. The ones with purple tabs are great and seem to be the right cut/size for my baby but we have blowouts regularly with the ones without purple tabs. There is no way of knowing which item you are going to get or else I would be sure to order the one I prefer.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Good Product--Box came crushed
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2019
reviews.review: Huggies diapers are always a wonderful product. I was sadly disappointed when I received the delivery today as it is part of a baby shower gift. It came in the original box--one side was totally crushed, the other side sunk in, top partially crushed, tape 3/4 of the way gone from top of box and stickers all over side of box. If this was going to my home it wouldn't be an issue but it is a gift for a baby shower tomorrow. Definitely looks like the box went thru the ringer before it got delivered. Guess I'll try to do a quick diaper cake or something

reviews.name: ChantellyBelly
reviews.title: Good product
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.review: I've never really had an issue with huggies. My go to brand but for some reason this batch, the diapers would pop open at the top whenever the baby peed.

reviews.name: Kristyy
reviews.title: Yup, they work LOL
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.review: Perfect

reviews.name: Danielle B.
reviews.title: Ok
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.review: These diapers are just ok. They are def smaller and don’t absorb as much as others. I have to change my sons diaper far more frequently than I do with other brands.

reviews.name: Doesn't stay in place
reviews.title: Good size
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.review: Not very many newborn available in bulk but these were and worked well

reviews.name: Sarah O.
reviews.title: i didn’t like the changes at all!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.review: Well, I have been store-buying the huggies diapers and satisfied with them. This was the first time I bought them online and I am disappointed unfortunately. The fluffy weird texture is not as soft as the smooth texture. I will keep buying huggies but not this one for sure.

reviews.name: Hinda Wiseman
reviews.title: Bigger Fit than Other Brands
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2019
reviews.review:
I like how these diapers pull the moisture away from the skin. They also hold a lot more wetness than most other diapers. I don't have to worry about changing my baby in the middle of the night when she's sleeping.
I took one star off, because my baby outgrew newborn around 9 lbs, but the size 1 didn't fit her properly until 12.5 lbs. She was constantly exploding and leaking dirty diapers, because they were too big on her, but I couldn't find a good enough equivalent, so stuck with these. I'm hoping I won't have the same issue again when she goes up a size again.

reviews.name: rocher
reviews.title: y
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.review: thank you

reviews.name: Abby
reviews.title: Great diapers, received late
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2015
reviews.review:
I used these exclusively for my son before switching to a cheaper option (Luvs), but for new parents who aren't experienced in telling whether a diaper is wet, these have a nifty stripe that changes colors. I started using them because the hospital provided them, so I just stuck with what I knew until I felt comfortable enough to change. Definitely recommend! The only reason I switched was price, which is not drastically different, but when you're buying lots of diapers....

I took off one star because I tried to set up a subscription for these (rookie mistake for very quickly growing baby), but the first package arrived about a month too late and my son is now in 3s...However, Amazon did provide an instant refund which was very very nice.

reviews.name: GLO
reviews.title: Good value
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.review: Good value. Got this as a gift for new parents and set it for the right stage/size and they love it!

reviews.name: S.C. Bicknell
reviews.title: Better than Pampers, but they do smell.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2019
reviews.review: We have quickly become a fan of Huggies diapers after we had a leaking incident with my daughters Pampers diapers on an airplane. We decided to try these Little Snugglers our with our new baby boy. We have compared these with the Pampers Swaddlers, and we find that the fit is way more superb, and they have an overall better feel. My only reason for taking off a star is that they have a gross smell when urinated in that the Pampers don’t have. I don’t think we will stop using them though.

reviews.name: Mouzam
reviews.title: Great diaper, just hope size 4 isn't out of stock again
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
reviews.review: Have been using these diapers for my son since he was born. The only time I noticed leaks were when he was 0-2 months but less than other diapers. It is great for sensitive skin. The only reason I knocked off a star is because for some reason the past few months size 4 was out of stock on amazon and most retailers and I was always on the hunt to find it. Glad it’s back in stock now

reviews.name: Gohar Shahbaz
reviews.title: good , not leaking but not best for sensitive skin.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.review: we like it over, not leaking , especially good for night time however did not work out sensitive skin , our little one have diaper rashes now

reviews.name: Kevin
reviews.title: Best diaper to stop blowouts from going all the way up the back!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2019
reviews.review: We've had A LOT of blowouts lately! For a few weeks, it was pretty much every poopy diaper. 😨 So we tried several different brands to find something that would work better! When I opened these, I was instantly impressed with the elastic across the back of the diaper. It has a little pocket to help catch blowouts! And while we do still have occasional blowouts, even in these diapers, the number has drastically gone down! Which makes me a happy mama!!

reviews.name: Heather S.
reviews.title: A bit too sticky but worth it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
reviews.review:
I love these! The only thing I don't like is the fact that the tabs come back and stick to the inside of the diaper. It makes things difficult when changing since I have to keep it from sticking to the poop in the diaper while handling a squirming little one.

They do great with keeping everything in, though. My son never had a blow out wearing one of these so that alone is worth the trouble for me.

reviews.name: Noah
reviews.title: SATISFIED!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.review: My son loves these diapers. And for a great price I cannot pass it up!

reviews.name: KeeJ
reviews.title: Love these diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.review: These diapers are amazing for my son, the pampers brand doesn’t work for him at all

reviews.name: cj
reviews.title: Great diaper!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2020
reviews.review: We switched over from the Pampers Swaddlers to these Huggies for our second son. I love the elastic waistband - really great part of this diaper. They’re absorbent, snug, and secure. Only thing is that they leave round indents on my son’s bum and he’s really not even in each diaper very long as a newborn. They go away, so no harm there. Overall a great diaper.

reviews.name: Kristine Frey
reviews.title: Great quality!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
reviews.review: Great quality! Soft, flexible, stays on GREAT! Has a flap over the inside back which has saved me from having to clean up blow outs!!! The only con is if he wears his diaper ALL night and it’s super full in the morning-sometimes the gel leeks out.....no problems during the day because he doesn’t go long without changes and it’s not even every night. Great diapers for a great price and this box lasts just about a month! Love that I don’t have to go to the store!!!!

reviews.name: Just being honest
reviews.title: Great diaper for boys not leaking out
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020
reviews.review: I have a boy and was having a hard time when I brought him home as he kept peeing out his pamper diaper. So I gave the Huggies a try and have not gone back to Pampers again. It stopped him leaking from the front and sides I would say by about 98% of the time. It was a review that saved me from having leaks and washing bedding 3 to 4 times a day

reviews.name: elorine
reviews.title: Better than their snug n dry
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
reviews.review:
Comfy for my newborn. Love the wide waistband as well as the indicator on the front for fastening as my husband tends to make our babies diaper too loose. It absorbs well and doesn't get all mushy when full so it doesn't feel like my hands are gonna break through the diaper any minute.
A good diaper for my newborn's tush and it compares well with the other leading brand.

reviews.name: Ryan Valdes
reviews.title: Awesome purchase
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.review: Great product and quality

reviews.name: QuietOwl
reviews.title: Good for small babies
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.review: My baby was born at 6 lbs and the newborn size diapers were just too big. These preemie sized diapers worked great for the first 2 weeks of his life until he could get a little bigger for the newborn size to fit better. Although I don’t like the chemicals in this diaper, the wetness strip was especially helpful in the early days.

reviews.name: Víctor
reviews.title: Están mejor los little movers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2021
reviews.review: Aguantan más los little movers de la misma etapa. Varias veces mi hija mojo su ropa porque se sale la pipí, el material que absorbe la pipí se llega a hacer bola, varias veces se rozo mi bebe. En general, son buena marca simplemente estos no salieron tan buenos

reviews.name: EwT
reviews.title: Good absorption, no leakage, no diaper rash, soft, fits snug.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2019
reviews.review:
These diapers were great for my premie boy who weighed between 4 pounds 10 ounces to 5 pounds 2 ounces during the duration of these diapers being used. They absorb everything, no leakage, and no diaper rash either. They fit snug, feel soft and keeps my baby comfortable. Also, lovely and cute design!

Only complaint is that the closing tab could be a different color for convenience.

P.S. Fits my toddler’s Cece baby too!

reviews.name: Thaggard
reviews.title: Recommend
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.review: Great diapers, seems to be the only diapers that don’t have a bad leaking problem. However, I’m editing this review a year and a half later because I just bought a pack of size 4 & at least 20 diapers out of the pack didn’t have a velcro latch on the left side.

reviews.name: Abby Wientjes
reviews.title: Hard to find tabs
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020
reviews.review: Good diapers, they fit my preemies well (4.5 and 5 lbs). We had no leaks with the pack we used. My only complaint compared to Pampers is that the tags are the same color white as the diaper and are hard to find/ grab quickly when you're trying to wrangle a wiggling baby quickly!

reviews.name: hittnikash
reviews.title: Some defects
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.review: Had some defects on these diapers. Like misalignment.

reviews.name: xcuzm3
reviews.title: Soft but leaky
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2014
reviews.review: With Amazon Mom, the prices here are unbeatable. The loss of one star is with the product itself, as I found them to leak often, especially if I'm not careful with how they go on DD. The leg holes are on the larger side, compared to Pampers Swaddlers, Baby Dry, and Huggies Snug & Dry plus, and they also seem to stay stretched (leading to leaks) when DD kicks and moves around a lot. I do prefer the softness and like the wetness indicator, but to keep from changing her clothes often due to blowouts and leaks, I prefer the Huggies Snug & Dry over the Little Snugglers.

reviews.name: Lisa
reviews.title: A little disappointed
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.review: My little one has been using another brand for a year. Recently, I decided to try Huggies since the price is better. After I tried it, I felt that it is a little thin and is not very absorbent. I may not recommend it to others.

reviews.name: AA
reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2020
reviews.review: Great for absorption and prevention of blowouts. However, the purple strip that is there on the size 3s is an absolute no thank you. It is stiff and digs into baby's legs, especially in the car or while baby wearing. Ditch the strip Huggies and then it's perfect. 👌

reviews.name: Kerstin Contreras
reviews.title: I prefer Huggies Special Delivery, but these are great too!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.review: Never had a rash & absorbs super well!

reviews.name: QuietOwl
reviews.title: Good for small babies
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.review: My baby was born at 6 lbs and the newborn size diapers were just too big. These preemie sized diapers worked great for the first 2 weeks of his life until he could get a little bigger for the newborn size to fit better. Although I don’t like the chemicals in this diaper, the wetness strip was especially helpful in the early days.

reviews.name: Andrea G
reviews.title: Leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2025
reviews.review: I’ve given Huggies several chances and finally have to admit that they just aren’t as good at leak protection. It’s a shame, because the contoured fit is much better on my baby than the boxier fit of their lead competitor. Moreover, they do not feel as durable, and they definitely cannot hold as much pee as Pampers. Alas, these do not work for my baby as much as I wish they did.

reviews.name: Hyoun Kim
reviews.review: They started to tear on the sides which had never happened with Huggies I purchased in the store. I had two boxes where a lot of the diapers were defective. Don’t waste your time or money! I only purchased from Amazon because size 5s are hard to find. I’ve completely changed diaper brands now.

reviews.name: Olga Davis
reviews.title: Disappointing Experience with Huggies Preemie Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2024
reviews.review:
Terrible Huggies Preemie diapers. First, the size is much bigger compared to other brands in the same category, making them too loose on my baby. This caused constant leaks—poo would spill out, and my boy would end up peeing outside the diaper.

To make things worse, the quality is extremely poor. Every second diaper ripped apart when I tried to open the side straps, which was incredibly frustrating during diaper changes.

I really wanted to like these diapers, but they just didn’t work for us. I won’t be buying them again.

reviews.name: Ian Ehrlich
reviews.title: Somethings different
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2024
reviews.review: Not sure what’s up with the size 4’s. We have been using Huggies since my baby was born and for some reason, when we sized up to size 4, he has had terrible diaper rash. We switched to Honest brand until the 1st rash cleared up and then tried them again because I wasn’t 100% sure of the cause. Within a day the rash was back leaving us with almost a case of unusable diapers and a painful blister. I don’t know what has changed, but it’s disappointing. Unfortunately we’re going to have to make the switch.

reviews.name: Jannette L
reviews.title: not a good look
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2025
reviews.review: Box was all taped up look like it was open before and re wrap i just return this and was sadded becasue it was a baby shower gift

reviews.name: Eva Vas
reviews.title: Strong Chemical Smell and Paint-Like Patches on Size 2 Diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024
reviews.review:
Size 2 diapers have a very strong chemical smell. They also have purple patches that feel like thick paint on the front where the closure is supposed to be. There were no paint patches or any chemical smell when I ordered the exact same diapers in bulk in sizes Newborn and 1.
Now, I've ordered a 72-count pack in size 2 and don't know what to do with them—I definitely can't use them on my baby. Unfortunately, I will have to switch to another brand.

reviews.name: Esa talla no me sirve. Mi. Bb usa. Del número 4. No me gusta que lo pongan automático
reviews.title: No
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2025
reviews.review: No me usa esa talla mi bb. Es número 4

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: 🫠
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024
reviews.review: These work slightly better than the snug&dry but are still not worth my money. They leave cotton like remnants on my kid every single time, they don’t hold much pee and aren’t good overnight diapers. Ridiculous in my opinion that you have to buy two separate kinds of diapers for day and night (did not have to do that with my oldest) but I know these companies just want more money so the quality of diapers has gone down hill drastically. Can’t wait until she is potty trained

reviews.name: thamara
reviews.title: old diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024
reviews.review:
I recently purchased diapers from Amazon, as I usually do, but this time the product arrived with several defects. The diapers were smushed, the elastic doesn't hold well, and the attachment isnt the best. I was out of options so I'm using them anyway.It looks like the diapers are old, to be honest. Just want to let you know that his type of issue and lack of quality isn't what I expected.

Best,

Thamara Valenca

reviews.name: Jacj CG
reviews.title: Bad batch? Or product significantly worsened
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
reviews.review:
I start by saying I love Huggies… these were the only diapers my son (now grown) could use without getting a rash… However, the last batch (our first size 2…) we got from our daughter was lacking in quality.
I am concerned that Amazon is selling the “deffective batches” to us customers to maintain the great prices.

These are the major issues we encountered:

1) the diapers were “small”: I had just finished a pack of pampers gifted to us…and noticed the Huggies same size a LOT smaller… I thought it might just be a difference in products except that from time to time I would get a bigger Huggies in the same bag

2) the straps were facing up in some. Some of the diapers were defective… the strap were facing up instead of sideways which basically made the diaper very difficult to use

3) most diapers would rip on the edge when I stretch them … for the first time after 3 kids (my youngest is 5mos) I have issues with Huggies ripping

4) for the first time I see silica residue on my baby’s skin

Absorbency: Cannot complain… the diaper holds quite a bit

Sensitive skin: the diaper does not fit as well due to the deffective cuts and sometimes my baby’s skin is red where the edges of the diaper touches (never had this issue before)

Leak protection: Again, the diaper is small and odd with the straps not quite facing to the sides which makes it a bit difficult to put on… it may be I am guilty of not placing the diaper correctly sometimes and thus the leaks…

reviews.name: Olena Varzar
reviews.title: Not recommended for a baby
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2024
reviews.review: I ordered this item few weeks ago and the item came with 6 packages of 24 diapers inside. First 3 packages were good, however, the last 3 packages had diapers damaged inside. Under damaged I mean the diaper filling was super tough almost like a rock and definitely I would never put it on my baby. It seems like it was stored in wet conditions and then were dried before the delivery. ABSOLUTELY NOT RECOMMENDED!!!!

reviews.name: Storm
reviews.title: My experience with different diapers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
reviews.review:
Im a first time parent and am experimenting with some brands of diaper for my baby. I have tried kirkland , pampers, huggies so far.

KIRKLAND
Kirkland diapers are the cheapest and if you can find it on a deal it's super cheap. The absorption of liquid is very good. And I have never spotted a leak from that. But those diapers have some design prints in the outside which is in blue color. It greatly confuses if the diaper has turned blue or yellow. Another drawback I found is the adhesive flap immidiately sticks to the inside of the diaper and makes it difficult to roll it for disposal. So I'd rate it 5/10

HUGGIES
These diapers have the same type of adhesive flaps as kirkland ones. It doesn't seem to be that big of a problem, But the diaper gets swollen even before it is half full and baby starts feeling very uncomfortable on a single pee. Also the inside of the diapers has embossed pattern which makes imprints on the baby's skin.It has leaked once!! I wonder what solely is the purpose of a diaper So to me Huggies is a big 'No' . I'd rate 3/10

PAMPERS
So far it is the best. The adhesive flaps are broad enough and elastic. The sticky tape is colored yellow, this is very helpful when changing diapers in the night light.
It has no prints to confuse with the blue line.
It also doesn't has any pattern. And pampers occupies less space than the other two I tried.
And that's the sole reason it's a bit more pricey than others but I'd say it's totally worth it!
9/10

reviews.name: I had a subscription for this, which give them 1 month to deliver and they are running late!!
reviews.title: They are not on time with the delivery
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
reviews.review: The product is fine… the deliver date is horrible!

reviews.name: Hailey C.
reviews.title: These are fake or terrible new manufacturing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024
reviews.review: I’ve been using these diapers for 2 kids for the past four years and I think this last batch is awful. Not soft or absorbent. See the pic with the bubbles are the good ones. What happened?!?

reviews.name: kolokolo
reviews.title: Size 3 and up does NOT have the dotted liner that keeps baby dry
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024
reviews.review:
Little snugglers size 1-2 have the dotted liner (officially called GentleAbsorb® Diaper Liner) which keeps the surface very dry. HOWEVER, from size 3, they no longer have this liner. So the surface is wet and no longer dry as it used to be.

Little snugglers is also thinner than Little snugglers plus, and it gives my baby rashes that she never had in 7 months. I do not recommend this diaper.

reviews.name: nicholas
reviews.title: Leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2024
reviews.review: Must be old defective product. Constantly having leaks and needing to change clothes. Last straw was when a fresh diaper leaked after only wearing for 15 minutes. Costco has bulk newborn diapers online that’s are much better, same brand just with the plus.

reviews.name: Gabrielle Tyra
reviews.title: Nah
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.review: Newborn and size one are amazing. Size 2 and up have weird, scratchy, purple tabs that break out baby’s skin and the sides aren’t even. They seem to run smaller than other brands I’ve tried too. They also don’t last well overnight. Baby almost always soaks through. The inside isn’t as soft as smaller sizes either. Overall unimpressed with these. Once your little is bigger than a size 1 I do not recommend.

reviews.name: LYNN
reviews.title: Disappointed with the inside lining- not the usual quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.review: I have loved Huggies Little Snugglers since my daughter was in the preemie size specifically for the inside layer that looks like little dots and wicks away moisture super well. Even when they are near full, they usually still feel dry to the touch. I ordered these size 3’s when my baby sized up and the inner liner was not the usual one even though the picture states it would be. They do not wick away moisture like the other ones. I live in Haiti and had to have these transported in from my mailing box in Florida so I couldn’t even send them back. I’m not sure if it’s a fluke but I’m very disappointed and would not order these again if that’s how they all are. Super bummed.

reviews.name: asterismW
reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2024
reviews.review: I used to really like the Little Snugglers variety of Huggies. Now they're little better than the Snug and Dry. They're thinner and less absorbent. Very disappointed. If you want a diaper like what Little Snugglers *used* to be like, you'll have to go with Little Movers now.

reviews.name: MarketWizard
reviews.title: Zero Leak Protection
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.review: Sometimes, products perform so poorly that I feel it would be a disservice to humanity if I didn't write a review to warn other parents. These diapers leak. Not because there was too much poop or pee, but because they are terrible diapers. In one morning, I changed three diapers in a 90 minute span. All three of them leaked. None of them had a full load, just liquid, but all of them leaked. Terrible product. Terrible design. Huggies always disappoints.

reviews.name: Morgan Michener-Brown
reviews.title: Stringy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.review: Usually we like the huggies brand however not this time. Unsure if it was just a fluke box or what but every diaper we have used so far becomes extremely stringy when we take it off our baby. As soon as we un stick the flaps it pulls a bunch of string out and it gets caught around our baby's leg. Honestly afraid to buy these again, hopefully it's just a fluke box.

reviews.name: Nia williams
reviews.title: Not the best with leak protection.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.review: My infant leaked through overnight and wet his whole inside and the bed. These are not the same quality as the Huggies I get in the actual store . They do not hold liquid very well and they just seem like the quality again isn’t the best. I’ll continue to buy mines out of target

reviews.name: John Parker
reviews.title: Lets waste through like a sieve
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2024
reviews.review: Absolutely no blowout protection. Constantly having to change outfits for the day. Occasionally soils outfits with even normal size BMs. Very disappointed.

reviews.name: Clark Sims
reviews.title: Frays and left strings when undoing diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.review: The quality of these diapers was very bad. Every single one ripped and tore and left strings and fabric that got entangled around my child's waistline and worst-case private areas. We ended up finding every single one in the 96 pack exhibited this issue. Won't buy from here again.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Quality went way down!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.review: These diapers used to be wonderful. Recently they changed the picture on the diapers and the quality went WAY down. Now when my baby poops, it seeps right through the material of the diaper! It's not even that it's leaking out the sides, it's just seeping right through because the material is so thin and cheap now. And they somehow think it's okay to still charge the same price. If they don't make the quality better again I will no longer be purchasing Huggies.

reviews.name: Love flower
reviews.title: Nope.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
reviews.review: Not a fan. When I change my babies diaper I often have to the clothes too. Does not hold lot of urine. Leaks in the front and sides.

reviews.name: A HG
reviews.title: Snags
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.review: Almost every one of the 128 diapers would snag large amount of material and wrap around a body part of my preemie grandson when to changing. We used Huggies a few years ago for my other grandson and they were amazing. This batch my grandson feels the wetness immediately. I am extremely dissatisfied with this size 1 batch.

reviews.name: Hunter R
reviews.title: Knockoff/defective? NOT gentle absorb liner (p-3)
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.review: Diapers I received don’t look like the ones I buy from the store. The quality was worse, smelt like chemicals, and the gentleabsorb liner was completely missing. The listing on their website and here on Amazon says they should have them for p-3 sizes, but ones I received were either defective or a knockoff. Box says dryliner vs the listing. We LOVE these diapers as they’re the only ones he doesn’t leak through so I’m disappointed I can’t trust to get them shipped from Amazon.

reviews.name: Caitlin
reviews.title: False Advertising
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.review:
Bought this “pack” of diapers as a gift for a baby shower. The picture shows 1 pack of 20 diapers.
I received (see picture) 7 packs of 3 diapers each. Wasn’t even aware you could buy diapers in 3 packs. This is very weird to give as a gift now. I don’t want to go through the trouble of returning and buying again. Complete false advertising here. What you see is NOT what you get.

reviews.name: FyH
reviews.title: Baby is allergic
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
reviews.review: No hate for the company though

reviews.name: cicely akinsola
reviews.title: These can not be Little Snugglers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2017
reviews.review: I do not know what is going on but these are nothing like the little snugglers I bought before. Like other reviewers, my little one went from the size 2 to a size 3. The first thing I notice was these did not come in the original packaging. I thought, 'Hey, they said they might not so fine." Then I noticed they are not as soft; they seem rougher and thinner. Third, they do not fit as well. They actually fit worse than the size 2. Last, they do not seem to be as absorbent and leak pee very easily. They should have come with a bottle of detergent for all the onesies I had to go through. I went to the Huggies website and none of the diapers pictured looked like these. And now, paying attention to this page, they describe and picture two different diapers. The little snugglers I like do not have the double grip and they have GentleAbsorb liner and not this DryTouch liner. Notice both these liners are mentioned. Unfortunately, this came with my first subscribe and save order so I can't get a refund. I do not know if this is all Huggies Little Snugglers size three, but I think I'm going to switch to another brand. Sad because I absolutely loved the size 2 version.

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: Not the same as the 96count box
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2024
reviews.review: Bought this big pack in size 1 I’ve bought them from target in the 96count size and these aren’t the same. They don’t seem as soft, even though this has the same description and it’s Winnie the Pooh design is different.

reviews.name: iamdanyelle
reviews.title: Disappointing Changes
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2019
reviews.review: Super disappointed with the “new” Little Snugglers. We’ve been using the “old” ones for years and (stupidly) assumed the update was just to the box. Almost the entire box of diapers has hard crunchy things inside the diapers - like if they got wet, dried & sent to us anyway. They aren’t nearly as soft either, which has always been a huge plus. As if that weren’t bad enough, the cost per diapers has is significantly higher (increased cost for fewer diapers). Huggies have been our go to diapers, as we find they work best for our chubby babies. Hopefully we just got a bad box bc if the next arrives with the same issue, we’ll definitely have to find a new brand.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Not the same quality as size 1 and 2
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2022
reviews.review: As other reviewers have mentioned, these diapers are not the same quality as the size 1 and 2 Huggies snugglers. These have a different texture on the inside which is rougher, and the absorbent material has lumps and hard bead like things inside. When I pick up my little one, the whole diaper feels kind of crunchy. It can’t be very comfortable. I didn’t believe other reviewers and thought they might have just gotten a bad batch but I wish I hadn’t ordered these. We’re using them until we run out but we’ve already switched to pampers’ fragrance free line for the diaper bag and I’m much happier with those. I do not recommend these diapers.

reviews.name: FC
reviews.title: Fiber problem.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
reviews.review: These Huggies Preemie diapers worked well enough to hold in the baby's pee and poop however, they left long fibers and lint all over my baby's genitals. I would regularly pull 3 inch long strings of fiber from around his privates and in his rolls. This seems like a health risk as they could hold on to the urine within a diaper that would otherwise be absorbed and potentially conteibute to infection if unnoticed during changing. I've seen at least one other review mention this issue, so I know its a problem for other people as well. Beware of this issue if you purchase. Im not sure if this issue is in any other sizes.

reviews.name: Lexi
reviews.title: Bait & Switch, again?!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2017
reviews.review: Switched from Pampers Sensitive Swaddlers because my son was having an allergic reaction to them. Also, the pampers we used at the hospital were so much better than what we bought from Amazon. The Amazon ones left little crystals on him and were less soft and way less substantial. I felt like it was a bait and switch. Fast forward to Huggies, loved them after trying a box from the store. Size 2 from Amazon also worked well. We just got size 3, and the diapers are different! They arent as soft, the lining is different, they feel plasticky and I just found little crystals all over him. Considering theyre covering some essential parts, this disturbs me a lot. I have a giant box and another unopened one my mom ordered for him. Not sure what to do but I am not happy with Huggies or Amazon. Pics included, size 2 is on the left.

reviews.name: Garry Tran
reviews.title: Too many leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2021
reviews.review: Since my son was born our primary diaper was pamper swaddler. We had used huggies a couple times since it was gifted to us. After 9 months we are finally out of our baby shower stash and I decided to branch out from pampers and switch to huggies because I like the design (flexible stretchy tabs). I order these and I'm disappointed. Since the change We haven't made it through a single night without having to change my sons clothes because the diaper leaked. I even made an effort to change him after 6 hours of sleeping instead of waiting until the morning. His clothes were already wet by midnight.

reviews.name: Glory
reviews.title: Special delivery or snug and dry are better
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.review: I’ve tried 3 kinds of huggies now and this is my least favorite of the 3. They leak the most and my baby’s thighs are red where they hug around his thighs. I’ve only had a blow out with this type. I would rate the special delivery as the best I use them overnight and have never had any problems. Next, would be the snug and dry they are made cheaper, but I didn’t have any problems with that kind of diaper even overnight I didn’t have leaks. I didn’t really care for the Mickey print though. I thought these would be the same as far as quality goes but I’ve had leaks every morning. I will definitely not be buying again.

reviews.name: Narek Ohanyan
reviews.title: Deformed batch
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.review: Very disappointed by this batch, it does not keep the poop inside the diaper no matter how little there is, every time there is a leak through. All his undershirts are ruined with stains.

reviews.name: Quincy Arey
reviews.title: Too expensive
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.review: I for whatever reason thought it would be a larger box of diapers but for only 20 that's a lot of money. Almost a dollar a diaper. I get about 18 at the store for under $10. Next time I'll read the description closer. I used all within 4 days.

reviews.name: Amanda L.
reviews.title: Hard spots on diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2020
reviews.review: Since these were a little cheaper than Pampers, I decided to make the switch and try these out. I like the double adhesive on the front for a really secure fit and the pocket in the back to keep a dirty diaper from going out of the diaper (although my baby hasn’t tested that feature yet so I can’t say how well it works). However, several of the diapers had hard spots.. I’m not sure what caused this, but it didn’t seem like it would be comfortable on my baby and I had to throw some away, which is such a waste and ended up making this purchase more expensive than Pampers. I’m making the switch back.

reviews.name: SweetheartFinds
reviews.title: WOW these STINK
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2021
reviews.review: We have been using Huggies special delivery since birth which are delightful but a little more pricey. Figured Id follow the good reviews and buy the snugglers. Well, the reviews do not lie, the chemical smell when they pee is so bad, I can smell it just sitting near him. Yes they absorb well but at what cost?? Might give the rest of them away. I dont want my son sitting in chemicals all day, no thanks, and the smell gives me a headache I swear.

reviews.name: MrsDBL
reviews.title: Packaging not as advertised.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.review: I purchased this as a part of a diaper tower for an upcoming baby shower. What I received are seven individual packages of diapers. These are the similar type of samples purchased in bulk that we give out to new moms in our pediatric practice. Very disappointing.

reviews.name: Omar Raja
reviews.title: Defective Batch?
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020
reviews.review: Very disappointed with Huggies or Amazon for selling a different box of Huggies Size 2. I have bought it many times before without any issues, but this one box I've received - the diapers are super scratchy, super thin and barely absorbent. It leaks constantly, and I've never had a concern before with the other diapers of the same size I've gotten in the past from Amazon. Any way for a new batch or someone to reach out to?! Be aware when purchasing for all those reading!

reviews.name: Milos
reviews.title: Good price not very efficient
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.review: Baby is 2 weeks old- smaller size. We used preemie type and problem is that it doesn’t stick properly so throughout the day diaper gets disconnected. Other problem is that sometimes poop is coming out (2times happened) so maybe it’s not absorbing enough..

reviews.name: Joyful Nest
reviews.title: Product changed
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.review: I have used these for 6 years, 3 different babies and used to love them. This pack doesn't have the soft lining but is the same as the cheap snug and dry lining. What happened huggies?

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.title: Was good, but now terrible
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.review: Did they just recently change how they are made now? We used to love this brand, but now it barely holds. We had three diapers in a row come loose. I am going to a different brand.

reviews.name: Reviewer
reviews.title: Absorption is not good enough
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.review: My kids are going through these diapers like nothing. The diaper hardly absorbs urine. The Huggies Plus from Costco are a lot better. Unfortunately, I can’t seem to find them here. So it looks like I'll be going back to Costco soon.

reviews.name: Juan
reviews.title: Eau de Pee Pee
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2015
reviews.review: Within 90 minutes of diapering the baby, we both smell like pee because the pee has soaked through the diaper and our clothes. This baby is only 2 months old, we're not talking a race-horse. And I really don't think it's user-error, as the pre soaks right through the front-center, not the leg holes or anything. Might as well be using cloth diapers if I have to change him Every. Single. Hour. And at night? Yeah, everything smells like piss and everything is damp. Pampers are working just fine, not like this at all. But thanks to Amazon Mom, I now have a whole case of these to use up. I am accumulating three pee-soaked outfits a day to wash, and you know what? A two month old boy is not a fashion diva who enjoys clothes changes. :(

reviews.name: Miriyam
reviews.title: Rashes
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2024
reviews.review: My babay got rashes with huggies.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: No Umbilical Cord Cutout
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.review: I bought specifically because it stated “umbilical cord cutout” and as you can see in the photo they don’t have the cutout. So now I will have to fold them in the umbilical cord area if Im going to use it for my newborn or wait to use them until the umbilical cord falls. Plus the box came open, if the pampers weren’t in a plastic bag I would definitely return them...but Im donin 3 weeks so I wont.

reviews.name: Joseph J Saravo
reviews.title: Diaper Leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.review: We typically use the huggies little movers or pull-ups, which do a great job. These were on sale, so we figured we’d give them a try. They are very think and leak, which doesn’t happen to us with the pull-ups or little movers. They are just ok as a daytime diaper, but are not so good at night. If you’re on the fence about getting these or the little movers, I’d definitely go with huggies little movers.

reviews.name: Principle
reviews.title: Premie size does not fit at 5lbs leaves lint everywhere, do not recommend.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.review: Diaper uses what looks to be the tabs off their full size diaper so the Velcro and things are too wide. Constantly pushes the diaper down and scratches their belly, also leaves a lot of fibers on your baby. Maybe the other sizes are okay but stick to other brands for premies, the fit is much better.

reviews.name: Nicole Cerami
reviews.title: Not the same
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.review: This is the 12th time I have ordered these diapers from this seller and they are not the same. Less soft and less absorbent. Not what I have come to expect from Huggies.

reviews.name: Sashelle Wilson
reviews.title: Not good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2024
reviews.review: Still leaks quality not good.

reviews.name: Megan Landreth
reviews.title: Not a single pack of diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.review: I received 7 separate packs of three diapers each, not a single pack of 20 as I was expecting. Not what I wanted for the gift I was trying to purchase for a friend, but not worth returning.

reviews.name: Tim Shepard
reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - These diapers are different
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2017
reviews.review: These are not the same!! I subscribed to these because I was using little snugglers and fell in love with them. When I received these diapers, they were completely different. They don't feel as quality, the pocket in the back isn't as good, the elastic in the back isn't as strong, and the inside of the diaper doesn't have the quilted dots anymore. I am very disappointed and feel like I've been tricked. Everything about huggies little snugglers that made me buy them over any other brand has changed.

reviews.name: ryan h.
reviews.title: Different diapers.. BE CAREFUL
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
reviews.review: The Huggies diapers that arrived were completely different compared to the store bought Huggies. The Huggies (left) that arrived print was darker, stiff around the waist area, and once wet the diaper gets hard on the inside. My baby unfortunately did get a rash from THESE diapers but not the store bought. I am returning them and returning to buying them in store

reviews.name: Lydia
reviews.title: Works great, chemical smell
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.review: We loved Huggies from being in the hospital with them. The P and N sizes were perfect, but the size 2 box we got has a very strong smell of paint thinner or nail polish remover when there’s urine in the diaper. I won’t be buying any more Huggies.

reviews.name: Heidi
reviews.title: Product not sealed
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.review: 140 ct: Both bags not sealed. Does not look tampered with, but a manufacturer defect. However, you can never be too safe and I can not tell if this is normal or if they have been tampered with. Will have to waste my time returning and trying my luck with a new order. Likely poor quality control.

reviews.name: reneelynn
reviews.title: Leaking
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.review: I have used these diapers since my son was born and now he's 2 months and now there's always leaks And the sides are fraying if that's the correct word .

reviews.name: Bronson and Morgann
reviews.title: Defective diapers a lot of them
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
reviews.review: I love these diapers but it’s very frustrating when I am paying for the 180 count and 20 diapers are defective and I can’t even use them. The strap is missing on a lot so I can’t even wrap it around my baby. Diapers are expensive so it’s frustrating when I can’t even use all of the ones I’ve paid for .

reviews.name: AEverding
reviews.title: Amazon needs to check returns more carefully before reselling
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020
reviews.review: There is nothing wrong with the diapers. We love Huggies and they work great. My problem is that Amazon needs to check their returns more carefully before reselling them. I opened the box to see a sleeve of diapers completely missing. When I looked at the box I could clearly see that the bottom has been retaped. This is so frustrating. This is the second item this has happened to us recently.

reviews.name: GeekMom
reviews.title: Not high quality anymore
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
reviews.review: At first this quality was very high quality. Then they changed the diaper and now it comes apart easily. There are threads that come out from the fibers that wrap around my sons private parts. I’m very surprised that the same diaper I’ve been buying for years for my first son and now my second have changed in quality so much.

reviews.name: Bonnie B.
reviews.title: Damaged box
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.review: I was disappointed the diapers box was crushed on one end. This was part of a shower gift. The shipping box was not damaged.

reviews.name: Nicole Steele
reviews.title: Cheap
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.review: I haven’t used these yet but we ordered these thinking they would be better than the Huggies snug and dry thinking they would be a better material for our daughter. Wrong! The material feels cheap even on the inside of the diaper and they are thin so hopefully they don’t leak!! They don’t feel soft at all on the inside like the snug and dry do.

reviews.name: Eman
reviews.title: They leak
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.review: They did not suit my baby well. He would leak after single use

reviews.name: Kelli
reviews.title: Old style
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.review: These seemed to be an old style and they left fibers all over my newborn. Couldn’t use them.

reviews.name: Svetlana
reviews.title: Leaked thru seams
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.review: These diapers seamed to have leaked thru with every other diaper. Not sure if it was a bad batch. More than half of the diapers didn’t hold much. Everything came out from the seams.

reviews.name: copa
reviews.title: My 9 mo is leaking urine like if he was a newborn
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2017
reviews.review: I thought my baby was outgrowing these but reading all the recent reviews I understand that it's the new "technology" that is to blame for the leaks I'm getting. My 9 mo is leaking urine like if he was a newborn! Actually worse, never had these issues with leaks before, and he urine goes through the diaper, especially at night. Day care had the same issue too. I don't write reviews unless I think it will help someone. Thanks for the previous reviewers for helping me figure out what was wrong before I spent money on a larger size. Now I don't know what to get!

reviews.name: Nokia600
reviews.title: Allergic reaction
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2024
reviews.review: Son was allergic to these.

reviews.name: Andrina T. Samuel
reviews.title: Huggies diapers are very irritable to my baby's skin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.review:
I do not like how the adhesive irritated my baby's skin. No matter how i put the pamper. I switched from pampers to huggies because the pampers are very flimsey and do not hold much pee, my baby's clothes are always wet when she wakes up.
Im very disappointed in the way they make those diapers for babies.

reviews.name: eval
reviews.title: Missing a pack of diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.review: Recived only 5 packages of 33 not 6 1s. Box was partially opened. Don't know what part of the suppy chain this happened on. Ordered some 2 at the same time and they came in tact.

reviews.name: Julie
reviews.title: The old ones are better
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2019
reviews.review: My daughter loved how soft the old ones were. These are still soft but they had a weird smell and seemed to give my little one a rash. She also had more leaks which was unfortunate. I don't think I will be purchasing these again in the future.

reviews.name: Katelyn Typhair
reviews.title: I'm very disappointed. I just went to get the last two ...
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2016
reviews.review: I'm very disappointed. I just went to get the last two packs out of the bigger box and it looks like the indicator strip is moldy in one of the bags (maybe on one diaper in the other pack too). The lot # is PA602806F 07:16. Obviously these need thrown away. Now I need to run out to get different diapers. Shouldn't diapers last? Why are they getting moldy?

reviews.name: Erica
reviews.title: Defective diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2020
reviews.review: We’ve been using Huggies for my daughter since she was born and love them, however, this box we ordered just a couple weeks ago was full of defective diapers. The side pull tab tears right off when we try to secure it on my baby. I’ve reached out to the company. Hoping they will help. :(

reviews.name: Pbear
reviews.title: Difficult
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.review: Compared to the Pampers preemie diapers these are much more difficult to get the tabs separated and they seem to stick a lot more.

reviews.name: marks
reviews.title: Weird smell, but good quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2021
reviews.review: Great leak protection and quality. Bad review because they had a strong chemical smell upon opening. I let them air out before using them. The smell did go away. Once the baby wet the diaper and needed changing, a weird smell came back.

reviews.name: BowHunter60
reviews.title: Incomplete package
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.review: Box arrived on time however it was half full. It was missing the full number of diapers.

reviews.name: Adnan
reviews.title: Delivery was horrible
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2020
reviews.review: The box seemed to have dropped in dirty water or some oil mixture. The box was opened and diapers inside were dirty as well. Although the diapers are highly recommended and fits well for our newborn! But greatly disappointed in the delivery

reviews.name: Emily Chandler
reviews.title: Defective Batch of Diapers: No Blue Line
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2020
reviews.review: Disappointed with these diapers...the yellow-to-blue line that indicated wetness on the back of the diaper was defective. If baby peed in the front it would turn blue, but not in the back. Hate checking to see if my daughter is wet, and not knowing.

reviews.name: Phonso smith
reviews.title: The pampers felt like they had tiny rocks in it
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2020
reviews.review: I usually like huggies but the pampers felt like they had hard tiny rocks in it this time. I believe this happens when you expose it to moisture and then it dries. It was very disappointing to find out that all of the pampers felt that way.

reviews.name: Mamma Treehugger
reviews.title: All blow outs. All day.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2018
reviews.review: I wonder if this was just my experience, but... everytime my son pooped, these diapers leaked. Every. Single. Time. The only up side were the cute designs on the front. I kindly donated the remaining half of the pack to my friends for their baby shower game. I'm a mom. I realize that at some point, I will be up to my elbows in doodie. But every day? In every outfit? Hard pass. I'm sticking with Pampers.

reviews.name: OEKAYA

reviews.review: Don’t waste money here this item is totally garbage mi son never had rash but when I used that he got rash so bad n every 2 hour diaper is full

reviews.title: These stink of chemicals!

reviews.review: I’ve been a long time Huggies fan but this batch stinks so much of chemicals! It’s stinking up the whole bedroom. Very disappointed.

reviews.name: Justine
reviews.title: Did not like packaging/delivery
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2020
reviews.review: The item itself was fine. I just didn’t like how the box was delivered. It could have easily been stolen since the Huggies label was visible. This should be delivered inside a box itself to prevent theft.

reviews.name: Shailender
reviews.title: leaks and leaks not what we expected.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2015
reviews.review: Leaks.not once not twice it just simply leaks we fear every time we are going to have a mess to wash middle of the night. We were happy with the NB one so we decided to return the ones we got Costco huggies box and order these. Seriously I could happily do without a wetness indicator line since you are going to have a wet baby indicator to tell you that anyway. I am moving to pampers next time lets give those guys a chance and see if we have a leaky weaky!

reviews.name: Skylar
reviews.title: Hmmm no thanks

Cons:
